alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Presidio Valley; Terrell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 21 at 4:34AM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...A hard freeze is expected with sub-freezing temperatures from 10 to 20 degrees possible. * WHERE...Rio Grande Valley, Terrell County, Central Brewster County, and Chisos Basin. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and hard freeze conditions will likely kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Presidio Valley; Terrell
